segments.text: I notice the boy is stretching so high to reach the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s going to fall if he’s not careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is just standing there, waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the stool is already wobbling under his weight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so focused on that plate, she doesn’t see any of this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how much water is pouring onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets are going to be ruined if this keeps up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the children will get in trouble when she finally notices.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so innocent, just holding out her hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the boy doesn’t take too many cookies and lose his balance.
segments.speaker: PAR
